jedupdate.core_body:
### CedSearchLinks
TODO
### Usage Out of the box, Code prettify module for Joomla comes configured to automatically perform syntax highlighting of source code snippets in or tags on your Joomla pages. Automatic syntax highlighting mode is pretty simple, but powerful at the same time. Several settings can be configured at: Administration - Plugin - cedsearchlinks
cedsearchlinks includes several CSS styles publicly available which are used as themes for code Prettify
